sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import './Grounds.css' import {bookgrounds} from '../data/data' const Grounds = () => { return (

Grounds

{bookgrounds.map((item) =>(

{item.name}

{item.location}

  • Facilities: {item.facilities.join(', ')}
  • Price per Hour: {item.price}
  • Available Slots: {item.slots}

Rating: {item.rating}/5

))}
); }; export default Grounds;
